analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ
analyzed: na saraṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇa

original: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ
analyzed: na araṇam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇa

original: nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ
analyzed: na na hetum dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam na na hetu

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo nahetu ca araṇo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā …
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ na hetu ca araṇaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri
